widgets¶

Console widget library for Python3.

This library is intended to help in data presentation from various console scripts. It provides tools for easy formating and rendering of many usefull ‘widgets’ like lists, tree strutures, tables, etc.

Note

Although production code is based on this library, it should still be considered work in progress.

class pydgets.widgets.ConsoleWidget(content=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Base class for all console widgets implemented by this library.

This class provides basic common methods for widget setup and rendering.

SETTING_FLAG_ASCII = 'ascii'¶

Widget setting: ASCII only output flag

Setting this flag to True will force the widget to be displayed using only ASCII characters.

SETTING_FLAG_PLAIN = 'plain'¶

Widget setting: Plain only output flag

Setting this flag to True will force the widget to be displayed without any fancy terminal formating (colors, emphasis, etc.).
